Module org.crudeemail
Package org.crudeemail.controller

Class SendController

java.lang.Object
org.crudeemail.controller.AbstractController
org.crudeemail.controller.SendController
public class SendController
extends AbstractController

SendController

Controller for send.fxml. Holds 3 input fields, 2 buttons, and 1 label. Handles the sending of new email, attachments, and or the errorLabel.
Version:
1.0
